name: Top Boost in a Can
details: Vox in a boxThe first of its kind, the Top Boost in a Can is the first pedal to utilize the entire circuit of the amp its based upon.  From sparkling cleans, to the elusive "edge of breakup", to full blown class A amp meltdown, it's all in there with a twist of a knob...  and, with a full British EQ to compliment the goods, you might just find an endless stream of creativity is waiting at your feet.
